feed.title: Combined summary - Reminder: Second BIP process meeting tomorrow at 23:00 UTC

entry.title: Combined summary - Reminder: Second BIP process meeting tomorrow at 23:00 UTC
entry.summary: On September 29th at 23:00 UTC, the second BIP process meeting will be held on the #bitcoin-dev Libera IRC channel. For those in the Asia Pacific region, it will take place on the morning of September 30th. The first meeting's summary can be found through a link provided [1]. Michael Folkson has shared his contact details including email, Keybase and PGP key for easy communication.
